source: LMFDB (L-functions and Modular Forms Database) - standard format only
notes: Dataset expanded from 185 to 975 standard LMFDB curves
Framework unchanged - no retraining or parameter tuning
All curves use standard LMFDB label format (e.g., 27a1)
Removed 100 curves with non-standard period format from different source
All curves independently verifiable via LMFDB.org
